column1: The 2020 United States Senate election in Wyoming will be held on November 3
column3: to elect a member of the United States Senate to represent the State of Wyoming
column4: concurrently with the 2020 U.S. presidential election
column5: as well as other elections to the United States Senate in other states and elections to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections. Incumbent Republican Mike Enzi is not running for reelection. The Democratic and Republican party primary election was held on August 18
column6: 2020. As both major parties have nominated a woman
column7: the winner will become the first female U.S. Senator from the state of Wyoming.
